general.question: What is Keyvoiced?
general.answer: Keyvoiced is a voice recognition app that helps you input text quickly anywhere by converting your voice to text.

general.question: How do I start using Keyvoiced?
general.answer: After installing the app, grant the necessary permissions, then tap the microphone icon to start voice recognition.

ads.question: Why do I see ads in Keyvoiced?
ads.answer: Ads help us keep Keyvoiced free for users. Watching ads also allows you to earn more usage time.

ads.question: How can I get more time without ads?
ads.answer: You can purchase a subscription to use Keyvoiced without ads and with unlimited time.

purchase.question: What subscription options are available?
purchase.answer: We offer monthly and yearly subscription plans. Check the 'Get More Time' section in the app for current pricing.

purchase.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
purchase.answer: You can cancel your subscription through your Google Play Store account settings.
